Description:
The Affordable Dream
Now is the time to stop renting and start securing your future. Interest rates are low and we have the perfect home for you. This home is as solid as a rock and offers 3 generous bedrooms with built in robes, large lounge, updated kitchen with plenty of cupboard space. Outside there is a large garage with combined workshop and carport allowing for ample off-street parking for the boat or caravan. All situated on a great block of 639m2 located smack bang in the middle of the Residential Growth Zone making this one of the best buys this year, within close proximity to schools, Corio Village Shopping centre, public transport and medical facilities. Don't miss this opportunity to own this prime piece of real estate.
Due Diligence checklist are available at www.consumer.vic.gov.au/duediligencechecklist

Description:
The perfect family home.
Situated on a 540m2 (approx.) block, this fantastic property is ideal for first home buyers, upsizers or the astute investor looking to expand their property portfolio. The home comprises of a spacious lounge which flows through to the light-filled kitchen and dining area (perfect for those family nights). Three carpeted bedrooms (all with BIRs) and a central bathroom service the home along with further features such as split system cooling, gas heating, large laundry, undercover entertaining area with built in BBQ area, garden shed & three car lock-up garage with workshop and separate powder room. Located in one of Corio's most desirable pockets, within close proximity of the Corio Shopping Centre, public transport, local schools and the Princes Highway for commuters. This truly is a desired location. Call to enquire today!

Description:
Room to Move
This magnificent example of quality, affordable family living is being offered to the market for the first time in almost 20 years.
Positioned in one of Corios best pockets and situated on a huge land allotment, this home has appeal for every buyer.
Comprising -
Three good-sized bedrooms with ceiling fans
Central bathroom with separate WC
Open kitchen and dining through to family living area
An enormous undercover outdoor entertaining area with built in fan and kitchenette
Garaging for at least 2 cars plus car port and further shedding
Expansive, well-cared for gardens on a land allotment of 697m2 approx.
Close proximity to all amenities including the ring road, Corio Village Shopping Centre, public transport and schooling.
Corio homes of this quality seldom last long in the market. This property will appeal to those looking for a solid family home, investors or locals considering an upgrade.
Call Wilsons to arrange your private inspection today.

Description:
Immaculately Maintained and Presented
Lovingly cared for, inside you will be greeted by a spacious living/dining zone featuring light filled spaces and neutral tones. The kitchen delivers plenty of space and flows effortlessly to the dining area and has easy access to the outdoor undercover entertaining area which is the perfect place for friend and family gatherings all year round. Three robed bedrooms (master with walk-in robe and ensuite), family bathroom services the other 2 bedrooms, separate toilet and separate laundry too. Also on offer is a double carport and a double garage, gas ducted heating, split system, ceiling fans and well-manicured gardens to enjoy or further enhance. Close to the Corio Shopping Centre, schools, public transport and the Princes Highway for easy access to Melbourne. Your inspection will not disappoint.

Description:
Opportunity, Potential & Value!
This classic brick 3BR home represents the perfect opportunity for 1st home buyers, renovators and investors alike to enter the ever-growing Geelong market at an affordable price. Set on a large 540m2 allotment with north facing rear yard and with-in walking distance to public transport, local schools, Geelong ring road, local shopping centre this completely original home is close to all amenities.
Located in a quiet, established street the property features private established gardens at the front, solar panels, timber floorboards, long drive-way, car port and rear garage/workshop.
The property could be developed (STCA), completely renovated or simply updated, the choice is yours!
Priced competitively due its original condition, the savvy buyer will see the potential value immediately and look to capitalise for the future.

Description:
Style and charm.
Stop looking. Start living, all the hard work is done! Take full advantage of the hard work that has lifted this home from mundane to magical. Styled up and opened up, the contemporary floor plan introduces open plan living & meals that is anchored by a easy flowing kitchen showcasing gas cooking, spacious pantry and a dishwasher. The home comprises three comfortable sized bedrooms (all with BIRS), central bathroom with bath & shower, 2 car garage & two car carport.
Featuring extras such as air conditioning, ceiling fans, 13 solar panels, electric roller shutters on all front windows, outdoor entertaining area and large grassed rear yard perfect for those summer nights. Only moments to local schools, Corio Shopping Centre, public transport and the Princes Highway for commuters. All this on a 559m2 (approx.) block, don't wait to purchase this slice of paradise today!

Description:
The ideal lifestyle.
Packed with comfort and a short stroll to Corio Shopping Centre, a well designed family lifestyle awaits the lucky buyer of this beautifully presented three bedroom home. However, the five-star location isn't the only alluring component to this charming family home.
The moment one sets foot inside the light and bright interior, the home's inviting nature comes to the fore, instilling a sense of warmth and comfort that radiates throughout the zoned single-level floorplan.
A kitchen enjoys pride of place in the radiant spacious living domain and offers plenty of space for the cook of the house, while an elegant living area on entry makes unwinding a breeze.
Soak up the peaceful serenity of the blossoming backyard whilst enjoying a warm coffee or glass of red on a warm summer's day.
Climate-controlled with split system heating and cooling, this bright and beautiful family home also features a separate laundry with quick toilet access, single car garage, garden shed, secure gated driveway and development potential on a large 664m2 (approx.) block (STCA).
Conveniently located within quick and easy reach to public transport, local schools and the Princes Highway. Call to inspect this remarkable family home today!

An enormous rear yard with plenty of room for the kids to play and ample off-street parking. Central location within walking distance to Corio Central shopping complex, medical facilities, Northern bay college P-8, public transport & the brand new integrated child and family center. This home would be perfect for first home buyers & investors alike.

Description:
Count Down To a Better Family Life Under Contract
This home has gone under contract!
It doesn't get much better than this for family living but with an offering like this you will need to act quick! Offered with 4 bedrooms or 3 beds and a study, 2 living zones consisting of a formal lounge and a living area with a practical kitchen with loads of bench and cupboard space plus modern appliances and a dishwasher and dining area that flows to the covered entertainment area. With an en suite to the master bedroom, the home also features central heating and evaporative cooling making it comfortable year round. With the backyard separated with fencing to allow for easy entertaining with kids and pets. Also offering a double remote access garage with rear door to another large shed which could be a garage, workshop or a man cave. Also includes 2 large water tanks and this home is impeccably presented an absolute treat to inspect and will meet all your family needs . Handy to shops, public transport and with Ring Road only moments away you can be anywhere quickly or enjoy the peace and tranquility in this quiet court offers. A true family home with many offerings, in a quiet court, the only issue is you need to act fast.
Due Diligence checklist are available at www.consumer.vic.gov.au/duediligencechecklist

Description:
Great home with huge garage on 764sqm
Set on a large 764sqm block, this property is bursting with options. It's a must-see for everyone from first home buyers to investors, developers and those who simply need room to move and play.
The neat and tidy home is spacious with three bedrooms and a central bathroom, plus a separate lounge and well-equipped kitchen and dining area. Outside, the huge yard is ready for the kids and the 6m x 9.8m garage with workshop set behind secure gates is sure to appeal. Conveniently located within walking distance of schools, Aldi, public transport, parks, bike paths and just minutes to Corio Village or two turns to access the Ring Road. You can choose to enjoy this great home for yourself, rent it out right away or hold onto the large block with future development in mind (STCA).
Due Diligence checklist are available at www.consumer.vic.gov.au/duediligencechecklist

Description:
Comfortable & stylish living.
Stylish and functional, this 4-bedroom home features a practical floorplan designed for family harmony. Spanning one expansive level, the home offers a choice of light-filled living. Inside, the kitchen with adjoining meals area is certain to please the fussiest of chefs; its central position ensuring that indoor/outdoor hosting is a breeze.
Four comfortable bedrooms and centrally located bathroom are separately zoned creating a space for the children to call their own. Among the many highlights are ducted heating, air conditioning, water tank, double car garage & double car port. Situated in a quiet family-focused neighbourhood, the home is within easy reach of various shopping destinations including the Corio Shopping Centre, public transport, local schools and the Princes Highway for a stress-free commute.

Carpets throughout.
Floorboards in dining & kitchen.

Space in the rear yard for another 3 cars.

Description:
Stunning Renovation
Your search is over. You have found a home to own where there is simply nothing to do... but move in and enjoy. From the front lawns to the back fence, the effort and quality that has gone into this home is like nothing else you have seen. With a brand new kitchen, complete with modern appliances ,including a dishwasher, plenty of cupboard and bench space plus a clever breakfast bar that looks out to the serene backyard. The bathroom appears to have been lifted directly from a magazine, with the free standing bath, floating vanity, new shower, and concrete styled floor tiles. Each bedroom is generous, with new carpets and built-in-robes. The master is especially large. The light filled living room is vast, with a hidden study area or perhaps the perfect reading area. The freshly painted walls, along with the stunning polished timber hardwood floors, striking light fittings (& LED downlights), make for a stylish home. The gas heating and a air conditioner make it a practical home as well . Outside offers an oversized garage, plus a secondary corner entrance, plenty of space for any toys, boats, vans etc.. The low maintenance landscaped garden provides a feeling of a sanctuary in this quiet court location. Handy to Aldi, public transport, schools and offering easy highway access, it just doesn't get any easier/smarter/better... Inspecting this home is an absolute pleasure.
Due Diligence checklist are available at www.consumer.vic.gov.au/duediligencechecklist

Description:
Character style home. Inspections available via appointment only!
Well positioned in a private and peaceful street location is where you'll discover this generously proportioned yet low in maintenance single-level sensation.
Offering two bright and spacious bedrooms accompanied by a central bathroom, this tasteful family home on a smart 714sqm (approx.) allotment is ready for you to move straight in and enjoy immediately.
Beautiful detail throughout with carpeted flooring, while a fantastic addition of a water tank, gas log fire, split-system cooling, gazebo and a fantastic outdoor pond delivers a stylish touch.
This impressive home with an open-plan meals/kitchen area is perfect for those who enjoy the space and comfort when it comes to dinner time. A gas stove and plenty of storage space makes the cooking process enjoyable and clutter-free.
Equally spacious is the huge living area, which captures the northern sunshine perfect for those sunny summer days!
The private cul de sac setting attracts minimal traffic flow, making it an ideal location to raise the kids. Furthermore within close proximity to the Princes Highway, Corio Shopping Centre, public transport, transportation & local schools are only moments away.
Inspections available via appointment only!
Insights: 4 Michigan Avenue, Corio VIC 3214 was last sold in 2019 and 13 other 2 bedroom house in Corio have recently been sold.

Description:
Great investment opportunity.
Add this to your property portfolio, 3 bedroom home in a good location and in a long term lease. Currently leased at $280 per week and leased until 2021, this property will certainly surprise. With a modern kitchen with plenty of cupboard and bench space, gas hot plate cooking, wall oven, range hood, dishwasher and good sized pantry. The lounge has gas heating, split system heating & cooling, ceiling fan, 3 good sized bedrooms, 2 with BIR, and a large bathroom. Outdoors has a large covered alfresco area good sized rear yard with plenty of shedding and work shop area or plenty of storage room. Located close to primary and secondary schooling and only a 5 minute walk to Corio Village shopping centre.

Description:
Renovate and reinvigorate.
Here is a great opportunity to get into the market or add to your property portfolio with this 3 bedroom home in central Corio. Situated on a 650m2 (approx.) allotment and within a short walking distance to Corio Village Shopping Centre, kindergarten, primary and secondary schools. This property is a great starter project to reinvigorate the home with plenty of potential for a makeover. The home has 3 good sized bedrooms, central bathroom with bath & OHS, vanity, sep W/C off the laundry, A/C, garage and good sized yards. The property is zoned residential growth zone, Rgz2.

Description:
This one's for everyone.
Home buyers and astute investors, this beautifully presented three-bedroom home is sure to entice a host of buyers.
Placed in a premium location offering excellent access to local schools, Corio Shopping Centre, parks, sporting fields, public transport and the Princes Highway for those who commute to the Melbourne CBD. Couple that with a fresh, smart and easy-to-maintain, single-level floorplan you will be wise to call this place home.
The opportunity is also perfect for the developer (STCA).
Prepped and ready to move in, allowing the future occupant without a worry in the world. Timber floorboards underfoot team up with the sun-kissed living spaces to deliver strong contemporary notes, while a centrally located family bathroom, cook's kitchen with a stainless steel cooker, split-system heating and cooling and ducted heating accentuates its character.
Owner occupiers will enjoy arriving home to a large, grassed front yard as you unwind in the comfort of the spacious living. All bedrooms, meanwhile, are of generous proportions and fitted with built-in robes.
The private grassed rear yard caters for large BBQ gatherings, while a spacious carport with drive-through access into the double car garage are further highlights.
Call to inspect today!
Insights: 12 Rosemary Avenue, Corio VIC 3214 was last sold in 2019 and 174 other 3 bedroom house in Corio have recently been sold.
